title: Pixel 2 XL random reboots every 5-10 minutes after Android 11 update. Problem goes away with no SIM
content:
Basically what the title says. When I remove my sim, my Pixel 2 XL works perfectly, so I doubt it's a problem with a 3rd party app.

I'm on AT&T.

When my sim is in there, my phone soft reboots every 5-10 minutes. I can trigger it sometimes by sending or receiving a text message. This all started after updating to Android 11.

Any ideas? if not, is there a way I can view the logs in Developer settings and share them?

As a separate question, all my text messages were accidentally deleted as I thought it was a problem with texting. They've been backed up through the auto backup option in Settings. Any way to restore them? I'm using Textra as my messaging app.
